data.question: What is the chemical formula for the hydrated form of Ni-STA-12?
What structural change occurs in Ni-STA-12 upon full dehydration?
data.answer: The structure changes from rhombohedral to triclinic.

data.question: Is the transformation from hydrated to fully dehydrated Ni-STA-12 reversible?
What is the unit cell composition of fully dehydrated Ni-STA-12?
What type of adsorption sites are present in dehydrated Ni-STA-12?
data.answer: Coordinatively unsaturated nickel cation sites and P=O groups.

data.question: Does Ni-STA-12 exhibit permanent porosity after dehydration?
What is the adsorption uptake of CO2 at 1 bar on fully dehydrated Ni-STA-12?
How does the adsorption of CO2 compare to CH4 on Ni-STA-12 at 1 bar?
data.answer: The adsorption uptake of CO2 is about 10 times that of CH4.

data.question: Is the adsorption of CO2 on Ni-STA-12 selective over CH4?
What happens to the color of Ni-STA-12 upon adsorption of CO at 77 K?
data.answer: It changes from yellow to green.

data.question: What is the effect of water on the IR spectrum of dehydrated Ni-STA-12?
data.answer: Water adsorption results in the formation of a broad band centered at 3300 cm−1 due to hydrogen-bonded water.

data.question: Can the adsorption of hydrogen on Ni-STA-12 be completely reversed at 20 K?
What is the initial enthalpy of adsorption for CO2 on fully dehydrated Ni-STA-12 at 304 K?
Does the structure of Ni-STA-12 adjust to accommodate CO at all nickel sites?
data.answer: Yes, the structure can adjust to accommodate CO at all nickel sites.

data.question: Is the adsorption of CO on Ni-STA-12 at 77 K irreversible?
What is the effect of methanol on the IR spectrum of Ni-STA-12?
data.answer: Methanol adsorption results in the disappearance of the band attributed to the P=O bond and formation of bands associated with bound methoxy groups.

data.question: What is the effect of acetonitrile on the P=O bond in Ni-STA-12?
data.answer: Acetonitrile interaction shifts the P=O bond to a lower frequency.

data.question: Does Ni-STA-12 prepared with N,N′-2-methylpiperazinebismethylenephosphonic acid remain rhombohedral upon dehydration?
What is the symmetry of Ni-STA-12 after adsorption of acetonitrile from the gas phase?
What is the maximum uptake of toluene by dehydrated Ni-STA-12 at 300 K?
